# Welcome to the Course ðŸŽ‰

You have completed <span id="progress-count">0</span> sites so far.

<script>
  // Initialize progress in localStorage if not set
  if (!localStorage.getItem('completedSites')) {
    localStorage.setItem('completedSites', '0');
  }

  // Function to update the displayed progress
  function updateProgress() {
    const count = localStorage.getItem('completedSites');
    document.getElementById('progress-count').textContent = count;
  }

  // Call once on page load
  updateProgress();

  // Increment progress when user clicks the button
  document.getElementById('add-progress').addEventListener('click', () => {
    let count = parseInt(localStorage.getItem('completedSites'));
    count += 1;
    localStorage.setItem('completedSites', count.toString());
    updateProgress();
  });
</script>
